lines.text: I thought all of my friends are dead by now.
your friends maybe, but anyhow we are all ok.
Why? Because it got no open-stage applause?
You're not the kind of person to need anyone's support. And besides, you have that clay plate I gave you. It resembles me perfectly.
'Your children will look like me' said a friend of mine to her lover as he left her.
Yes. And he didn't love them.
late, when I wasn't waiting anymore... unwanted and terrible, like a disease. It isn't happiness. It's a disease. One must lie till it passed, or till it kills you... overcome it, or die.
